Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to interactive gaming
Summary: Authorizes interactive gaming in the state of New York.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to interactive gaming
